application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The Three Cypress trees are situated within the rear garden of 5 Nightingale Close. They can partly be viewed from the public highway between properties from within both Nightingale Close and Stevens Close, as a result they have a collective moderate amenity value.

The applicant wishes to reduce the height of all three Cypress trees by 3m, 4m and 6m, reductions in heights by this much will drastically reduce their amenity values and leave them with the appearance of being topped. To allow more light to the garden is not seem as a valid arboricultural reason for this level of work, I would however note that the removal of broken branches is exempt from the application process.
Having regard to the reasons given for the proposed work, the work is unjustified and will have a detrimental impact on the visual amenity and arboreal character of the area.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
description: To carry out tree surgery including To bring down in height by 6 metres, cut back branches going in to neighbours garden and trim branches facing house One Cypress (T1 on application) T18, To bring down in height by 4 metres and take branches out that are falling out of the tree One Cypress (T2 on application) and To bring down in height by 3 metres One Cypress (T3 on application) both within Group 2, all on TPO 381
